comment: Took him online for lab and he was great! He stays on the zoom call as we are doing the experiment which is very helpful.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: His syllabus had me shaking that I'd never manage - so detailed I thought I'd never get it all correct, especially my lab manual. Ended up w/ As on all lab reports and pre-lab quizzed. The quiz over the lab you take afterward was always tough, and that's where the final is pulled from. An A going into final, B average overall. Take him if you can.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: talks very quietly so if your hearing is bad, better buckle up. he explains the lab before starting but sometimes it gets very boring because he has a monotone voice. said he would check the notebook every week but he didnt. overall, hes very helpful if you have questions and answers them nicely! id take him again
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Caring
